fields.Business Description: Your #1 centralised Bash script automation platform

Key Features
- Centralized Script Management: Run and organize all your Bash scripts from one secure interface.
- Real-Time Monitoring: View detailed execution logs and output streams in real time.
- Credential & Variable Management: Store and encrypt sensitive data like credentials and environment variables.
- Automation & Scheduling: Schedule recurring tasks and chain multiple scripts into automated workflows.
- Script Playlists: Create sequential automation flows for complex deployment scenarios.
- Collaboration Tools: Enable teams to share scripts, track activity, and manage permissions easily.
- Webhook Integrations: Trigger scripts or send notifications via GitHub, Slack, or other external tools.
Benefits
- Reduce operational complexity by managing all servers from a unified platform.
- Save time with reusable, templated scripts and scheduled tasks.
- Strengthen security with encrypted secrets and controlled access.
- Gain full visibility and control over infrastructure automation.

fields.Business Description: Add a web virtualization layer to any website.
fields.Long Business Description:
"Webfuse is the world’s first web augmentation platform, allowing you to extend, automate, edit, and share any website through virtual web sessions
Utilizing an advanced virtualization layer, Webfuse creates isolated, controlled, and customizable environments known as Virtual Web Sessions.
Core Capabilities of VWS(Virtual Web Session):
- Session Sharing: Allow multiple users to securely join and interact within the same virtual web session.
- Automation API: Programmatically manage and interact with virtual sessions to automate repetitive tasks or integrate with other systems.
- Virtual Participant Functionality: Utilize automated scripts or ""virtual users"" to perform actions within sessions.
- Extensibility: Leverage session events/actions and virtual web extensions to add custom logic and features to the virtual sessions.
- Session Recording: Capture sessions for training, troubleshooting, or compliance verification purposes.
- Content Masking: Automatically obscure sensitive data fields within sessions to protect information during observation or recording.
- Audit Logs: Maintain detailed logs of activities within virtual sessions for review and analysis.
- Advanced Security Features: Includes configurable options such as Cookie Guard, participant authentication/verification, additional request/response header injection, and a Lockdown App add-on for enhanced restrictions."
fields.Tags: developer tool, web development, developer tools

fields.Business Description: A-dapt is a UK-based B2B AI company pioneering Adaptive Media®, a human-centred technology that integrates Emotion AI, Conversational AI, and generative Content AI to deliver real-time emotional feedback in digital learning and professional training. Backed by EIT Digital, France Travail, Innovate UK, and private investors, A-dapt is currently raising its seed round to scale its proven AI format across LegalTech and other verticals. Its first commercial launch is with the UK’s leading witness-preparation provider, and introducing TestMyWitness.com to the US, a breakthrough platform that uses emotion-aware AI to help legal teams prepare witnesses with measurable improvements in composure, confidence, and credibility.
fields.Long Business Description:
A-dapt is an Anglo-French B2B AI software training company pioneering Adaptive Media®, a breakthrough AI format that integrates Emotion AI, Conversational AI, and generative Content AI to create emotionally intelligent, human-centred digital experiences. Unlike traditional systems that use humans to train AI, A-dapt uses AI to help humans train better, improving confidence, composure, and communication in real time.
The Adaptive Media® format delivers live emotional feedback directly in the browser, with no biometric data sent to external servers. This privacy-first, ethical design embodies the principles of sovereign, human-supportive AI, helping organisations deliver adaptive, emotionally aware learning and assessment without compromising trust or compliance.
A-dapt’s first commercial launch in LegalTech is with the UK’s leading witness-preparation provider, introducing TestMyWitness.com a professional-grade platform that helps legal teams prepare witnesses for court and deposition. The system combines emotion-aware video analysis, transcript synchronisation, and AI-driven performance feedback to improve witness composure, clarity, and credibility under pressure.
Supported by EIT Digital, Innovate UK, and over €1.5 million in non-dilutive R&D funding, A-dapt’s Adaptive Media® technology has been validated through multiple real-world deployments and is now expanding into new verticals including corporate communication, compliance, and leadership training. An example of A-dapt’s human-centred AI approach can be seen in Human Centred AI, (for example, https://vimeo.com/manage/videos/1014471572), demonstrating how adaptive emotional feedback enhances learning and self-reflection.
A-dapt has been recognised globally for innovation and social impact — a Finalist at the SXSW Innovation Awards (2023 & 2024), multiple Learning Technologies and Learning Awards honouree, and Stationers’ Innovation Awards overall winner in 2023 and warrant holder in 2024. The company also presented at the All-Party Parliamentary Group on the Democratization of AI in Education, reinforcing its leadership in ethical, human-centred AI.
Now raising its seed round, A-dapt is scaling its Adaptive Media® format across LegalTech and professional training, advancing a new generation of AI built for people, not the other way around.

fields.Business Description: Guard by OffSeq is an AI-powered website security and compliance analysis platform that delivers instant insights into digital risk. It scans domains for cybersecurity gaps, privacy issues, and regulatory readiness (NIS2, GDPR), producing clear, actionable reports—no installation needed. Guard blends technical scans with business intelligence, helping teams understand and improve their security posture. Built in the EU, it integrates with OffSeq’s broader ecosystem for threat intelligence and managed cybersecurity services.
fields.Long Business Description:
Guard by OffSeq (guard.offseq.com) is an AI-powered website security and compliance analysis  platform designed for businesses and professionals who want instant insight into their digital risk  posture. It performs a comprehensive, multi-layer scan of any domain — analyzing cybersecurity  configurations, privacy practices, email authentication, and even compliance readiness for frameworks  like NIS2 and GDPR.  Unlike traditional scanners, Guard combines technical analysis with business intelligence — identifying  not only security gaps but also what technologies a website uses, how it handles user data, and how  its digital infrastructure aligns with best practices. 
The platform produces clear, human-readable  summaries suitable for executives, developers, and compliance officers alike.  Guard operates as a non-intrusive, black-box tool, requiring no installation or credentials. Within  seconds, users receive an actionable report detailing vulnerabilities, misconfigurations, and  improvement recommendations. Its AI-generated narratives help organizations understand security  posture from both a technical and management perspective.  
Part of the broader OffSeq ecosystem, Guard integrates with Radar (OffSeq’s threat intelligence  platform) and complements OffSeq’s managed cybersecurity services such as CISO-as-a-Service and  proactive monitoring. Built and maintained in the European Union by SEQ SIA (OffSeq), Guard helps  organizations across the EU strengthen their cybersecurity governance and demonstrate compliance in  line with modern regulations

fields.Business Description: Build dashboards with metrics from the tools you use and monitor analytics and SEO rankings.
fields.Long Business Description:
In today’s fast moving startup world, growth is everything, but growth without insight is just guesswork. For founding teams, juggling multiple tools to monitor metrics is a daily headache. That is where ZapDigits comes in: a clean, no code dashboard and analytics platform that brings together your SaaS, web analytics, and SEO data in one place, with privacy in mind.
The Problem: Too Many Tools, Too Much Time Wasted
If you have built or run a startup, you know the routine:
Log into Stripe to check revenue
Switch to Firebase or Auth to see new signups
Open your database to monitor user activity
Load Google Analytics for traffic sources
Dive into Search Console for SEO
Check YouTube for subscribers or comments
Six or more platforms every single day. Even if you spend just five minutes on each, that is 30 minutes lost daily. That is time you could spend building, strategizing, or talking to customers.
Malith and Mandy, the cofounders of ZapDigits, experienced this pain firsthand after ten years of building startups in Europe. They decided to solve it not just for themselves, but for others facing the same struggle.
What ZapDigits Brings to the Table
1. Unified Dashboards
ZapDigits lets you pull in metrics from Stripe, Supabase, GitHub, YouTube, Firebase, and more. You can build dashboards that show exactly what matters, all in one view, without writing SQL or setting up complex integrations.
2. Privacy First Analytics
Say goodbye to cookie based tracking. ZapDigits offers a cookie less, EU hosted, privacy friendly alternative to traditional web analytics. You still get insights like traffic, sources, and conversions, but in a way that respects user privacy.
3. SEO and Keyword Tracking
ZapDigits helps you follow your SEO progress. You can track keyword rankings over time and see how your domain performs in search results without switching to another tool.
4. Automated Reports
ZapDigits also sends reports straight to your inbox. Set up weekly or monthly emails so your key metrics arrive automatically without logging in.
5. No Code and Fast Setup
ZapDigits is built for simplicity. The onboarding process is quick: connect your tools, build your dashboard, and watch live data flow in. The focus is on clarity and speed, not complexity.
Pricing and Plans
ZapDigits offers flexible plans for every stage of your business:
Creator – $6 per month: 5 data sources, unlimited dashboards, and web analytics
Startup – $52 per month: 10 data sources, 10 projects, SEO audits, and more
Agency – $96 per month: unlimited projects, more data sources, and advanced support
All plans come with a four day free trial and no credit card required. Visit zapdigits.com
 to get started.

In addition to the physical hardware, Xylon offers a digital layer that verifies energy savings and environmental impact. These metrics are tokenized into real-world digital assets, enabling users to earn value based on their efficiency. The system bridges clean technology with decentralized finance by allowing individuals and facilities to not only lower their energy costs but also generate tradable rewards from energy efficiency itself leading to circular economy.

L.I.F.T. (Liminal Integral Foresight Tool) is a next-generation foresight platform that combines AI and human expertise to help organisations navigate uncertainty. 

By turning vast amounts of information into clear, validated insights, L.I.F.T. reduces noise, detects weak signals, and transforms them into actionable scenarios. 

Our goal is simple: to give decision-makers in business, government, and civil society the clarity they need to act today while preparing for tomorrow.
fields.Long Business Description:
Strategic decisions today are made in an environment of unprecedented complexity. Executives face information overload, fragmented foresight practices, and low confidence in their ability to respond to sudden change. 
Around 60% of managers still rely on intuition alone, not because they want to, but because current tools are either too rigid, too automated, or fail to provide traceable reasoning.
L.I.F.T. was created to close this gap. 
Our configurable foresight tool integrates diverse global data sources with user-specific inputs, applies AI agents to detect and cluster weak signals, and uses the STEEP framework to build trends and scenarios that are relevant for its user. 
Human validation is embedded at every step, ensuring that insights are trustworthy and explainable.
For organisations, this means:
	• Efficiency: up to 67% less time spent processing information ￼
	• Confidence: transparent, traceable reasoning for better decisions
	• Adaptability: a framework that adjusts to industry, scale, and context
But L.I.F.T. is more than a tool for individual companies. 
By empowering leaders across sectors to make well-informed, accountable decisions, it supports systemic resilience,  from climate action to sustainable economies, from social stability to technological governance. 
Our mission is to make foresight not a privilege of a few, but an accessible capability that helps organisations and societies thrive in times of hyper-change.

fields.Business Description: Get job applications done faster with AI cover letters. Upload resume, paste job description, get tailored letter in seconds. Free, unlimited use.
fields.Long Business Description:
What is an AI Cover Letter Generator?
An AI cover letter generator is a smart tool that uses artificial intelligence to create personalized cover letters for job applications. Unlike generic templates, this AI cover letter generator analyzes your resume and the specific job description to write unique, tailored content that highlights your relevant skills and experience.
The AI cover letter generator reads your resume to understand your background, then analyzes the job posting to identify key requirements. It matches your experience to what the employer is looking for and writes a professional cover letter that connects your qualifications to their needs.
Why I Built This AI Cover Letter Generator
A couple of years ago, when I was desperately trying to find a job, I had to manually write a cover letter based on each job that I applied for. This made my job hunting such a pain since I applied to over 300 positions. For each application, I had to read the job descriptions carefully and think about how my experiences in my old position could fit the new job requirements.
The manual process was exhausting and time-consuming. Spending 30 minutes to 2 hours crafting each cover letter meant that applying to 300+ positions became a full-time job in itself. Yet I knew I couldn't skip them – the risk was too high. Some HR professionals use cover letters as a way to eliminate applicants, while others read them carefully to decide if candidates are the greatest fit for the position. As a job applicant, you can't bet on HR not caring about the cover letter. You can't afford to lose a chance at an interview just because you didn't include a cover letter.
This painful experience led me to create an AI cover letter generator that solves the fundamental dilemma every job seeker faces: the need for both speed and personalization. My AI cover letter generator provides the perfect balance between a quick job application process and quality cover letters that earn interviews.
Why Do People Use AI Cover Letter Generators?
Job seekers face a fundamental challenge: they need to apply to many positions quickly, but success requires personalized cover letters. Research shows that 47% of job seekers skip cover letters entirely due to time constraints, while 84% fail to personalize even basic elements like company names. This is exactly the problem that drove me to create an AI cover letter generator.
The problem with manual writing is clear: job seekers spend 30 minutes to 2 hours per cover letter, yet 90% of generic cover letters are rejected due to lack of customization. With 250+ applicants per job posting, standing out requires personalization that most people can't sustain manually. Having applied to over 300 positions myself, I understand this pain intimately.
The strategic reality is that HR departments vary widely in their approach to cover letters. Some HR professionals will use cover letters as a filtering mechanism to eliminate candidates, while others read them carefully to assess cultural fit and genuine interest. Since 81% of recruiters have rejected applicants based solely on their cover letters, and 89% expect them, you simply cannot afford to gamble on whether a particular hiring manager cares about cover letters or not.
An AI cover letter generator solves this by providing both speed and customization. A study of 7,287 job applications found that personalized cover letters achieve 53% higher callback rates, while AI cover letter generator tools can create them in 20-30 seconds. This is the balance every job seeker needs.

Odixus is a software platform that helps organizations make screening faster, easier, and more reliable. Unlike traditional screening agencies, we provide HR departments and compliance teams with the tools to manage both pre-employment and in-employment screenings fully in-house.

With Odixus, you perform all required checks at a fixed, transparent rate — from identity verification and diploma validation (DUO) to Certificates of Conduct (VOG), references, employment history (UWV), and integrity checks. Our platform integrates seamlessly with your HR and onboarding policies, so you stay compliant while keeping full control over the process.

We believe screening should not be something you outsource because you have to, but a process you own because it makes your organization stronger. That’s why we continuously expand our platform with new modules, such as risk profile analysis, integrity questionnaires, and candidate self-service portals.

Odixus was founded to meet the growing demand for faster, more reliable screening solutions. Today, we support a wide range of sectors — from healthcare and government to education and professional services.

With Odixus, you gain more than software. You gain certainty, speed, and control in every screening decision.
fields.Long Business Description:
Who We Are
Odixus is a software platform that makes screening easier, faster, and more reliable for organizations. We are not a screening agency, but a technology partner that empowers HR departments and compliance teams to carry out both pre-employment and in-employment screenings fully under their own control.
We believe that screening should not be outsourced, but owned by organizations themselves to hire the right people and minimize risks. With Odixus, you gain a platform that supports and strengthens your screening processes, fully integrated into your HR and onboarding policies.
Our Origins
Odixus was born out of the growing demand for fast and reliable screening solutions. We started by supporting healthcare organizations in screening self-employed professionals, but quickly discovered that the need for in-house screening extended far beyond healthcare — into government, education, and professional services. This realization led to the development of Odixus as an independent screening software platform, focused on assurance, speed, and maximum control.
What We Do
With Odixus, you can perform all screenings at a fixed, transparent rate. Whether it’s pre-employment screening before hiring, or in-employment screening during the course of employment, our platform provides all the functionality you need to reduce risks and stay compliant.
Our software delivers instant identity, diploma, and integrity checks, giving your team clear insights for well-informed decision-making. We continuously add new modules, such as risk profile analysis, reference checks, integrity questionnaires, and self-service portals for candidates. This way, we don’t just support your screening, but strengthen the entire HR process — from recruitment to re-evaluation.
Our Mission
At Odixus, everything revolves around delivering certainty through intelligent screening. We combine innovative technology with human expertise, so that screening is no longer just a requirement, but a strategic part of recruitment, onboarding, and continuous HR management.
We want organizations to stop outsourcing screening because they have to, and start managing it themselves because it’s faster, safer, and more effective — with full control over both process and results.
Our Approach to Collaboration
We automate where automation adds value, and we recognize where human judgment is indispensable. We develop our platform in close collaboration with our clients, continuously improving and adapting to ensure that screening aligns with your processes, your policies, and the expectations of regulators and inspectors.
Increasingly, regulators and supervisory bodies expect organizations to manage screening in-house rather than outsourcing it. With Odixus, you meet these expectations and prepare for a future where control over screening and compliance is a vital element of professional HR management.
Our Culture
At Odixus, we believe technology only makes a real impact when it is combined with human values. Our culture is built on:
Reliability – delivering on our promises
Innovation – continuously improving and discovering new opportunities
Transparency – open communication with clients and colleagues
Passion and Purpose – because we believe work should be both meaningful and enjoyable
What We Stand For
We are Odixus. Screening software, not an agency. We provide your organization with the tools to organize screening faster, smarter, and more securely — always keeping you in control of who enters your organization. This way, you build a future-ready workplace based on trust, compliance, and certainty.

fields.Business Description: BALDR.AI is a Norwegian startup, founded in 2025 by construction and tech entrepreneurs alongside AI experts, on a mission to revolutionize the tendering process in construction. By leveraging AI and digital innovation, BALDR.AI automates and modernizes how contractors bid and manage projects, making the process faster, smarter, and more efficient. Currently focused on building partnerships and running pilot projects in Norway, the company aims to scale across the Nordics and Europe.
fields.Long Business Description:
Tendering in construction is largely manual and error-prone. About 90% of contractors still handle bids through PDFs, BIM models, Excel sheets, and emails, which is time-consuming and risky. Estimators spend up to 70% of their time extracting and retyping information instead of pricing strategically, leading to lost bids, reduced margins, and underutilised expertise.
Baldr.AI was founded to solve this bottleneck. Market research and pilot dialogues with Norwegian contractors revealed a strong demand for smarter AI-powered tendering tools. Existing solutions are either too generic or cover only isolated tasks, leaving a gap for an end-to-end platform that integrates document intelligence, risk detection, BIM data, and subcontractor coordination. This project is crucial for Baldr.AI to establish itself in Norway, generate early revenue, and lay the foundation for expansion across Europe.Baldr.AI offers a unique, end-to-end AI-driven platform built specifically for the construction industry. Unlike existing tools, which are either generic proposal software or narrow point solutions, Baldr.AI integrates automated document analysis, BIM data, risk detection, subcontractor coordination, and knowledge reuse into a single workflow. This combination of breadth, depth, and industry focus is unmatched in Norway, where no direct competitors exist, and internationally, where general-purpose solutions such as Altura, Civils, OpenTender.AI, Togal.AI, and Volve lack end-to-end capabilities. By providing domain-specific intelligence with human-in-the-loop validation, Baldr.AI delivers a clear competitive advantage and true innovation in construction tendering.

fields.Business Description: TimTodo is a simple SaaS built for agencies that need clarity instead of complexity. It lets teams manage projects and tasks with deadlines, track time, and instantly see profitability of clients, projects, and team members. Agencies can generate reports, create invoices directly from logged work, and collaborate transparently with both colleagues and clients. Designed from agency feedback, TimTodo focuses only on what really matters and continues to evolve to stay even more intuitive and user-friendly.
fields.Long Business Description:
TimTodo is designed with agencies in mind — creative, marketing, digital, or software teams that juggle multiple projects, clients, and deadlines every day. Many agencies told us they avoid using project tools altogether because existing solutions are overloaded with features and too complex to adopt. That’s exactly why we built TimTodo: to give agencies a tool that focuses on the essentials and makes their work easier, not harder.
With TimTodo, agencies can create and manage projects, assign tasks with deadlines, set priorities, and keep every team member aligned. Built-in time tracking lets employees log hours on tasks effortlessly, while managers gain full visibility into where time is spent. By defining hourly rates and internal costs, agencies can immediately see the profitability of each project, client, or even individual team member. This helps answer the most critical questions: Are we charging enough? Which projects are losing money? Where is our team’s time best invested?
The platform also simplifies reporting and invoicing. Agencies can generate clear reports for internal use or client transparency, and turn tracked work into professional invoices in just a few clicks. This not only saves admin time but also ensures that no billable hour is lost.
Collaboration is straightforward: team members can comment on tasks, attach files, and share updates without switching tools. Clients can also be granted access to specific projects, creating transparency and building trust.
TimTodo isn’t about giving you every possible feature — it’s about giving agencies the right features. Simple, focused, and practical. And we’re committed to evolving the platform further, making it even more intuitive and user-friendly, so agencies can keep doing what matters most: delivering great work and growing profitably
fields.Tags: Agencies, Time tracking, Profitability, Task managemen

Benefits
- One Platform, All You Need: Stop jumping between Pinterest, Instagram, and random Google searches. MyNextInk puts thousands of tattoo ideas, a custom AI generator, and a virtual try-on all in one place.
- Avoid Regret Later: Tattoos are forever—don’t risk hating yours in 10 years. With endless ideas, custom designs, and a realistic preview, you’ll be sure you’re making the right choice.
- Create Without the Wait: No more endless back-and-forth with your artist. Make changes instantly, try different versions, and land on a design you love—before you ever step into the studio.
- See It Before You Ink It: Use the virtual try-on tool to place your tattoo on your skin, adjust the size and placement, and walk into the studio with total confidence.

fields.Long Business Description:
Kliv is an agentic AI platform that builds web applications through interactive conversation. 
Unlike the first generation of AI builders that generate everything in a single reply, Kliv works like a real developer - thinking through requirements, creating a todo-list, inspecting files, making iterative changes, and refining code step-by-step.
Watch as the AI reasons through your project, asks clarifying questions, and methodically builds your application.
Perfect for rapid prototyping, entrepreneurs, and businesses who want professional applications without the technical complexity.
Start with a library of pre-built apps and websites or build from scratch - either way, you'll have a custom website for yourself, your business, or an internal tool in minutes. 
Your application gets free hosting on kliv.site from day one, with instant deployment and no configuration needed. When you're ready to go live, upgrade to a custom domain while keeping all your development tools in one place.
The built-in workspace lets you edit code directly, preview changes before publishing, and maintain complete revision history so you can roll back to any previous version.
Stage updates to test them thoroughly before your users see them.
Connect to GitHub for source control when your team grows, or export your entire codebase anytime. 
Every tool you need for professional app development is integrated into a single platform, from initial prototype through production deployment and ongoing updates. Invite your entire team with unlimited users and role-based access control.
Currently powered by Supabase for reliable backend infrastructure, Kliv is evolving to include a fully integrated backend that will give every app database, authentication, and API capabilities out of the box.

fields.Long Business Description:
EmailConnect is an inbound-only email processing service that converts received emails into structured webhook data. The service parses email content into JSON format, processes attachments inline or to object storage, and delivers data to webhook endpoints.
Use cases:
* Support ticket automation: automatically process e-mails sent to support@yourdomain using AI powered workflow platforms like n8n or Zapier
* Invoice processing automation: automatically extract relevant information from received PDF invoices and store required data in your bookkeeping software
* Customer feedback processing: automatically add bug reports of feature requests to your product roadmap
100% EU-operated, fully GDPR proof.

For ongoing protection, Mailerio’s real-time API integrates easily with your forms, CRM, or signup tools to stop fake or mistyped emails before they enter your system.
There are no contracts or recurring fees. You simply buy credits and use them whenever you need, they never expire. Plus, Mailerio offers premium support and expert advice to help you troubleshoot and improve your email performance fast.
With over 98% deliverability, 95%+ validation accuracy, and 99.99% uptime, Mailerio gives you reliable, high-quality email validation at a price that fits your budget. Clean your lists, improve your campaigns, and protect your sender reputation—all with one easy-to-use tool.

fields.Business Description: If you’re looking to buy used robots, Robotbids is your go-to platform. With an expert-backed marketplace, a curated selection of top brands, competitive pricing, and a seamless bidding process, we provide the best solution for businesses looking to scale with automation.
fields.Long Business Description:
Robotbids is the leading online marketplace dedicated solely to the buying and selling of robotics. It was created to meet the increasing demand for automation across various industries, connecting buyers and sellers of industrial robots, autonomous mobile robots (AMRs), collaborative robots (cobots), humanoids, parts, and accessories all in one reliable platform.
What sets Robotbids apart from generic marketplaces is its focus on the robotics sector. We offer a specialized space where manufacturers, system integrators, resellers, refurbishers, and end-users can easily trade robotics hardware with transparency and confidence. Whether you’re looking for a refurbished FANUC arm for welding, a Boston Dynamics Spot for inspections, or the latest humanoid robots ready to join the workforce, Robotbids makes robotics accessible and ready for trade.
At the core of Robotbids is a straightforward promise: to simplify robotics commerce. Our platform boasts powerful search and filter tools, allowing buyers to compare models based on payload, reach, applications, and condition. Sellers enjoy a hassle-free listing process with a flat 12.5% fee, ensuring competitive pricing and fair returns. To safeguard both parties, Robotbids collaborates only with verified sellers and upholds a secure transaction process, giving buyers peace of mind when investing in high-value equipment.
But Robotbids is more than just a marketplace. We’re building a supportive ecosystem for the robotics community. Through partnerships with Robots Wiki and Robots Marketplace, users can access detailed product information, industry insights, and educational content about automation trends. By merging commerce with knowledge, Robotbids empowers businesses and individuals to make informed, future-ready decisions regarding robotics adoption.
The robotics industry is growing at an impressive pace—spanning logistics, healthcare, manufacturing, agriculture, and even personal assistance. As factories embrace automation, warehouses deploy fleets of AMRs, and humanoid robots become more prevalent, Robotbids is here to facilitate this exciting evolution.

fields.Business Description: Krajete delivers innovative NOx reduction systems and NOx control technologies designed to capture and valorise emissions across industries. By using nature-inspired methods like adsorber-based purification and advanced bioprocesses, we help clients go beyond compliance. Our scalable NOx removal solutions serve as a powerful alternative to SCR systems, enabling businesses to transform harmful emissions into valuable materials. Whether tackling regulatory pressure or seeking sustainable innovation, Krajete supports a cleaner future by turning NOx into opportunity.
fields.Long Business Description:
Krajete delivers NOx reduction systems and NOx control technologies that let industrial sites meet ultra-low emission limits without the cost and complexity of catalytic processes such as SCR or SNCR. By capturing pollutants instead of burning or dosing them away, our skid-mounted equipment runs at low temperatures and eliminates the need for ammonia, urea or precious-metal catalysts—cutting energy use, preventing ammonia slip and slashing maintenance. That means fast compliance with the tougher caps set by the EU’s revised Industrial Emissions Directive, the U.S. EPA’s Good Neighbor Plan and the EU 2024 National Emission Reduction Commitments report.
Our modular adsorber slots straight into the exhaust line, first trapping NOx and, with interchangeable cartridges, also removing SOx and bulk CO₂. A short, low-grade-heat pulse regenerates the bed in place, extending adsorbent life over thousands of cycles and keeping downtime to a minimum. When carbon pricing bites, the same platform accepts an optional biomethanation reactor that blends captured CO₂ with green hydrogen to yield pipeline-grade methane, turning a disposal cost into a revenue-ready fuel.
These results rest on two core strengths: tailored adsorption materials tuned for selective, high-efficiency capture and microbiology that transforms waste gases into valuable molecules. Deployed across power generation, waste-to-energy, chemicals, mobility testing and marine engines, our solutions consistently achieve single-digit-ppm NOx with predictable operating costs—giving clients one trusted supplier for air compliance, carbon valorisation and fuel resilience.
Engagement is straightforward. We take a gas sample, run a detailed analysis and performance simulation, then issue a guaranteed removal figure with a fixed service schedule. Once approved, the same engineers design, build and install the skid, train plant staff and activate remote monitoring so results stay transparent. The outcome is assured compliance, lower OPEX than SCR/SNCR and a clear path to monetise captured carbon—delivered under a single contract with Krajete.
fields.Tags: carbon capture, nox control, nox removal, CleanTech

fields.Business Description: To-do List" is a simple and free to-do list and task manager application right in your browser.
fields.Long Business Description:
The "To-Do List" app is a tool used to organize tasks and help you keep track of tasks based on a specific deadline. Thus, the advantage of using a to-do list is that you can use it to track your workload and prioritize without forgetting anything.
Key features of the "To-Do List" expansion
- Use it for free (zero cost).
- Supports both dark and light themes.
- Add and edit tasks with one click.
- The ability to view the history of completed tasks.
- It is easy to find out the history of completed tasks.
- Drag and drop function to change the order and assignment of tasks.
- An easy-to-use search bar compatible with all popular search engines.
- Create a to-do list layout with a beautiful background to inspire yourself.
- It has a minimalistic, simple and user-friendly online to-do list that allows you to organize tasks in a few clicks.
How do I install the To-Do List extension?
1. When you find yourself on the Google Chrome browser extension page, click on the "Add to Chrome" button on the extension page.
2. After the installation is completed and the extension is added to it, a new tab will open.
3. In the new tab where the extension opens, click the "Save" button. Disabling Chrome's to-do list helps with this.
4. Everything! Now it's time to add your tasks and enjoy the effectiveness of the app.
Why choose the "To-do list"?
▸ Be organized.
▸ You will never miss deadlines because you know the list of tasks that need to be completed.
▸ Place all the stickers on one page.
▸ Keep track of your numerous projects and tasks.
▸ Maximize the productivity of your routine by adding tasks to your Google Calendar.
Try our Google Chrome To-Do List extension to simplify task management and increase efficiency and effectiveness.
Simple and user-friendly design:
Apps with to-do lists should be easy to use! Therefore, our extension has easy-to-use and less complex interfaces. Our center focuses on efficiently displaying all tasks using a clean and intuitive layout.
An accessible task management application:
Our extension allows you to add and edit tasks in just a few clicks! This way, you can easily create new tasks or even edit existing ones. There is no complicated layout, menu or forms here — it is simple to use.
Dragging tasks to change the order:
You can manage your tasks based on your priorities by simply dragging and dropping them. This way, you can easily rearrange or rearrange tasks with less effort.
Track your task history:
Do you want to check if you have already completed a task or check the completed tasks? Of course, you can do this using our To-Do List app! We have a built-in task history feature that allows you to track your productivity.
Simple search function:
Do you want to find a specific task in your extensive history? The To-Do List extension's search function can help you identify a task based on keywords or other criteria.
Update the inspiring backgrounds:
If you're the type of person who stays motivated through inspiring experiences, you can upgrade them in our extension! Just choose the right background to get a personalized experience.
Offer dark and light themes:
Whether you prefer dark or light themes, we have both for you! Just choose the one you like and calmly handle a large number of tasks.
Integrated search bar:
Do you want to find something in your favorite search engine without leaving the to-do list extension? Oh, we've got you covered! Rate this exclusive feature right now.
Free expansion of the to-do list:
Since we have a lot of unique features, is this a version without tools? You can enjoy all these amazing features without spending a dime. There are no hidden fees, down payments, billing or subscriptions. It's free.
What do you write in the to-do list?
In the to-do list, you write down the tasks that you plan to complete in your daily life. For example, you can include personal tasks, professional and team management, work tasks, shopping lists, household chores, shopping list, team work, meetings, personal goals, and more!
How do I make a list of the best things to do?
You can create a to-do list based on the following steps:
1. Make a list of all the tasks that you need to complete in order to cope.
2. Break down the larger tasks in your to-do lists into subtasks.
3. Prioritize your task list (set reminders if necessary).
4. Set reminders according to your requirements by tracking task lists (use location-based reminders).
5. Make an organized list of your to-do lists.
6. Add your most important work to your Google Calendar (if your app supports it), which will help you focus and keep the main interface organized.
7. Update your new tasks daily or frequently and go to the to-do list app.
Future features
The ability to create tasks using AI. We plan to integrate an AI assistant to automate and simplify the task creation process by creating a list of new tasks based on your goal.
The ability to synchronize tasks on different devices. We plan to synchronize your tasks and make them flexible enough to handle all your devices, including smartphones, tablets, and desktops. In this way, the sync feature helps you manage your tasks no matter which device you work with every day.
Integration with leading task management tools: The ability to connect the To-Do List to popular task management applications such as Google Tasks, Microsoft To-Do, Calendar events, Todoist and other applications on Apple devices (for Apple users) or in mobile applications. provides user flexibility.
Add Deadlines: You can add deadlines for each task to keep your list updated. Don't miss the opportunity to try out the best "To-Do List" that will help you manage tasks efficiently and efficiently!
FAQ (frequently asked questions)
What is a Chrome extension with to-do lists?
You can use this Chrome To-Do List extension to complete your tasks in one view instead of multiple views and organize your work effectively.
How do I create a to-do list in Chrome?
Add our To-Do List extension by downloading and enabling it in your extensions. Then start adding task data that will help you organize your work effectively.
How do I create a daily checklist?
You can create a daily checklist using the to-do list app to update your daily work or tasks, prioritize them based on deadlines, and mark tasks after they are completed.

Cubish is a seamless experience where the digital world merges with the physical.
It's already around you anywhere on Earth.
fields.Long Business Description:
Cubish digitally divides the entire surface of the Earth into over 5.1 trillion cubes, each covering 100 square meters of real-world space.
Each cube is a geolocated container where anyone can create one or more Cube Domains, digital spaces that can host multimedia content such as videos, audio, images, documents, and much more.
Thousands of Cube Domains, owned by different people, can coexist within a single cube, creating a unique layering of data in the real world.
In the future, Cube Domains within each cube will be organized based on content quality, thanks to a merit-based system that will highlight the relevance, usefulness, and impact of each Cube Domain.
Who is it for? Cubish is an open, general-purpose system, just like the web once was.
"The cube will relate to Cube Domains like a search engine relates to web domains."
With one fundamental difference: Cube Domains are anchored to real-world coordinates and can be expanded into other cubes through expansions, across entire areas, squares, shops, buildings, public or private spaces, even far apart from each other.
Each expansion of a Cube Domain can host different content based on its location, shaping a distributed, geolocated digital network.
"It's like taking a web domain and spreading it across the real world."
Today, it starts with data. Tomorrow, immersive technologies will be integrated.
Cubish paves the way for the coexistence of digital and immersive realities, layered onto physical spaces.
It is the first true Spatial Web, designed to bring the web into the real world and create an intelligent, living digital layer integrated into the space around us.
Cubish S.r.l. is an innovative startup officially registered in the Business Register (VAT: IT10724711212). The company is composed of 26 cofounders, including two corporate entities.
Cubish is protected by PATENT PENDING No. 102025000004906, filed on March 10, 2025, and currently within the 18-month confidentiality period.
fields.Tags: Spatial Web, Geo Web, Immersive Tech

fields.Business Description: Frames is a digital notebook for film photographers. It helps analog shooters log camera settings on the go and later embed them as metadata into their scans. Designed with care for detail and simplicity, Frames brings modern tools to the timeless craft of analog photography.
fields.Long Business Description:
Frames is a digital notebook made specifically for film photographers. It helps analog shooters keep track of the essential details behind every photo, such as camera settings, lens, film stock, location, and personal notes. Instead of juggling paper logs or repurposed note apps, photographers can now rely on a clean, intuitive interface designed just for their workflow.
Many film photographers develop a deep connection with their tools and process, but remembering the context of each shot weeks later can be difficult. Frames solves this by making it quick and natural to log information while shooting. Once the film is processed and scanned, these notes can be embedded into the final images as standard metadata, giving digital files the same rich context as their analog origins.
The app runs on iOS and macOS, with sync support through iCloud. Users can access their records across devices without worrying about vendor lock-in or hidden data collection. Frames is privacy-friendly, storing data locally by default and never collecting personal information.
Out of the box, the app includes a library of over 200 popular film stocks, and users can add their own. Cameras, lenses, and films can be saved as presets for quick access. Smart autofill features reduce repetitive entry, while map integration allows for tagging frames by shooting location. Notes can be grouped into folders, and final images can be exported with full metadata included.
Frames is the work of Vincent Tantardini, an independent designer and photographer who built the app to support his own creative workflow. It reflects a strong respect for analog photography while offering modern conveniences that stay true to the craft.

fields.Business Description: Thundercrawl is a cutting-edge tool designed to supercharge your website's visibility by generating AI-friendly LLMs.txt files
fields.Long Business Description:
Thundercrawl is a cutting-edge tool designed to supercharge your website's visibility by generating AI-friendly LLMs.txt files. Tailored for large language models (LLMs) like ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini, Thundercrawl transforms your website content into structured, markdown-formatted text files that enhance AI comprehension and drive referral traffic from AI-powered platforms. With a free test option, users can convert up to 5 pages, 10 blogs, and 10 products into an LLMs.txt file, ensuring your site is easily discoverable by AI systems. For advanced needs, premium plans offer expanded capabilities, including full-site crawls and customizable processing options. Simply input your website URL, select your processing mode, and let Thundercrawl empower your site with lightning-fast, AI-optimized solutions. Unleash your website’s potential today at https://thundercrawl.com. © 2025 Thundercrawl.com - Empowering the world with lightning-fast solutions.What is LLMs.txt?LLMs.txt is a proposed web standard designed to make website content more accessible and understandable to large language models (LLMs) like ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini. Unlike traditional SEO files like robots.txt (which controls search engine crawling) or sitemap.xml (which aids discovery), LLMs.txt provides a markdown-formatted file that curates and summarizes a website’s most important content in a clean, AI-friendly format. Hosted in a website’s root directory (e.g., yourwebsite.com/llms.txt), it helps LLMs efficiently process key information, such as API documentation, product details, or blog summaries, without navigating complex HTML structures, navigation menus, or ads. Key features of LLMs.txt include:Structured Markdown Format: Contains an H1 header with the site’s name, a blockquote summary, and sections with curated links or full text to guide AI models to high-value content.
AI Optimization: Enhances visibility in AI-generated responses, improving accuracy and relevance in chatbot answers or AI-driven search results.
Versatility: Useful for developers (e.g., for API documentation), businesses (e.g., for product descriptions), or personal sites (e.g., for CVs or portfolios).
No Blocking: Unlike robots.txt, it doesn’t restrict access but acts as a “treasure map” to direct LLMs to the most relevant content.
By implementing LLMs.txt, website owners can boost their site’s discoverability in AI-powered interactions, potentially increasing referral traffic and ensuring accurate representation in AI responses. Tools like Thundercrawl simplify the creation of these files, making it accessible for marketers, developers, and site owners.
fields.Tags: llms.txt, llms txt, llms.txt generator, llms txt generator, llm.txt, llm txt, llm txt generator, thundercrawl

fields.Business Description: Tensor Suisse AG is a Swiss-based investment vehicle dedicated to decentralized artificial intelligence. Modeled after MicroStrategy’s treasury approach, the company strategically accumulates and delegates Bittensor ($TAO) to generate compounding validator yield. Operating under a regulated Swiss equity structure with 10 million bearer shares, Tensor Suisse offers professional and qualified investors long-term exposure to the infrastructure layer of decentralized AI, without token custody or fund complexity.
fields.Long Business Description:
Tensor Suisse AG (in Gründung) is an institutional-grade equity vehicle based in Zug, Switzerland, designed to provide direct and compliant exposure to the emerging sector of decentralized artificial intelligence. Our model draws inspiration from MicroStrategy’s strategic balance sheet approach — but instead of Bitcoin, our core focus is Bittensor ($TAO), a protocol enabling open-source machine learning through a decentralized validator network.
Our business model centers around three compounding value pillars:
Strategic accumulation of $TAO at early-stage valuations
Validator participation, producing protocol-native staking rewards (approx. 14–18% p.a.)
Equity-based NAV growth, rotating investor capital into the treasury with increasing traction
We are currently conducting a CHF 250,000 private placement for 4.25% equity (on a CHF 5.75M pre-money valuation), with ticket sizes starting at CHF 25,000. Investors benefit from early-stage access, a clear equity structure under Swiss law (no token), and exposure to a $50B+ market opportunity in AI and decentralized infrastructure.
Our structure avoids regulatory bottlenecks by not issuing tokens or managing third-party assets. Instead, investors receive shares in a Swiss AG with TAO as the underlying treasury engine — building long-term NAV, validator revenue, and future optionality (subnet participation, listing, M&A).
This investment is suited for professional investors, angels, and family offices looking for early access to disruptive infrastructure in AI and crypto, under a clear European legal framework.
fields.Tags: Decentralized AI, Bittensor TAO, Swiss equity, Crypto infrastructure, Validator staking

Partbase GmbH is redefining how industrial spare parts are bought and sold across Europe. Headquartered in Barleben, Germany, we’re building a new digital standard for the MRO (Maintenance, Repair, and Operations) sector—a €100B+ market still dominated by outdated systems, legacy distributors, and fragmented supplier networks.
Our platform is B2B-first but B2C-smooth. We deliver a lightning-fast, frictionless procurement experience that feels more like a consumer app than an old-school industrial catalog. From intuitive navigation and real-time availability to seamless checkout and quote handling, every touchpoint is optimized for usability and speed.
Behind the scenes, we operate a hybrid inventory model that pairs smart, curated in-house stock with direct, live integrations into major supplier systems. This allows us to offer unmatched assortment breadth—think 500,000+ industrial SKUs—with full transparency on availability, lead times, and logistics.
For larger customers, we offer deep technical integrations: PunchOut, OCI, and real-time ERP syncing enable automated workflows from requisition to delivery. Whether you're a small plant maintenance team or a multinational manufacturer, Partbase is designed to plug directly into your procurement stack with minimal friction.
But we’re not stopping there. Our vision is to become the infrastructure layer for industrial e-commerce in Europe. We're investing heavily in UX, automation, and AI-assisted tooling—from personalized part recommendations to predictive availability alerts and smart reorder workflows.
At Partbase, we believe that industrial buyers deserve software that’s as robust and elegant as the systems they keep running. We’re here to build it.

fields.Business Description: Webmetic is a Munich-based B2B SaaS company that provides cookie-free visitor identification and website personalization technology. The platform enables B2B companies to discover which businesses visit their websites in real-time and automatically personalize content to increase conversion rates, all while maintaining 100% GDPR compliance. Webmetic serves clients like Messe München, Condor, and freelance.de with a transparent pay-per-lead pricing model ranging from €0.40-€0.95 per identified company.
fields.Long Business Description:
# Webmetic Business Description
## Webmetic: Transforming B2B Marketing in the Post-Cookie Era
**Webmetic** is a Munich-based technology company that has solved the biggest challenge facing B2B marketing today: identifying and personalizing for anonymous website visitors without compromising privacy. As traditional tracking methods crumble under browser restrictions and GDPR enforcement, Webmetic provides the privacy-first alternative that actually works better.
### The Problem We Solve
**95% of B2B website visitors remain anonymous.** Companies like BMW, Siemens, and Mercedes-Benz visit your website, research your products, and leave without a trace. Sales teams miss massive opportunities because they don't know who showed interest. Marketing budgets get wasted on broad campaigns when specific companies are already engaged.
Traditional solutions are broken. Cookie-based tracking is blocked by modern browsers. Privacy regulations make fingerprinting illegal. Consent banners kill conversion rates. The old playbook doesn't work in 2025.
### Our Revolutionary Solution
Webmetic identifies **which companies** visit your website in real-time, then automatically personalizes their experience – all without cookies, consent banners, or privacy violations.
**Real-Time Company Intelligence**: Instantly discover when BMW visits your automation solutions page or when Volkswagen downloads your manufacturing whitepaper. Get company name, industry, size, location, and engagement insights the moment they arrive.
**Smart Website Personalization**: Your website automatically adapts content for each visiting company. Automotive manufacturers see industry-specific case studies. Healthcare companies see compliance-focused messaging. Every visitor encounters content that speaks directly to their business needs.
**100% Privacy Compliant**: Operates under GDPR without consent requirements. All processing happens in German data centers. External legal validation confirms complete compliance. No cookies, no tracking, no privacy violations.
### Proven Results That Matter
**30-80% conversion rate improvements** through personalized experiences. **50% better lead quality** because prospects already understand your relevance. **Reduced acquisition costs** through precise targeting. **Enhanced sales efficiency** with qualified prospect intelligence before they even inquire.
Current clients include **Messe München**, **Condor**, **freelance.de**, and major European trade shows like ISPO and IAA Mobility. The platform identifies over **47,000 active companies monthly** across customer websites.
### Why Webmetic Wins
**Technology Leadership**: Only provider with completely cookie-free architecture immune to browser changes and privacy regulations.
**Superior Data Quality**: Advanced AI algorithms deliver higher accuracy than cookie-based competitors, with comprehensive company profiles including industry classifications and digital presence data.
**Effortless Implementation**: Works with any website technology. Integration takes days, not months. No technical expertise required.
**Transparent Pricing**: Pay only for identified companies (€0.40-€0.95 each). No setup fees, no data limits, no hidden costs. ROI is immediate and measurable.
### Market Opportunity
The **€3.2 billion global B2B visitor identification market** is in complete upheaval. Chrome eliminates cookies in 2025. GDPR enforcement intensifies. Traditional providers are scrambling to adapt broken technologies while Webmetic leads with purpose-built solutions.
Companies that move first gain decisive advantages. While competitors struggle with consent rates and tracking failures, early adopters deliver personalized experiences that convert at dramatically higher rates.
### The Webmetic Advantage
Founded by **Yannik Süß**, a technology entrepreneur with 15+ years in web analytics and a track record of successful implementations at major companies like E.ON, ING, and Condor. The team combines deep technical expertise with proven business experience across B2B marketing, enterprise sales, and regulatory compliance.
**This isn't incremental improvement – it's the future of B2B marketing.** Webmetic enables the transition from privacy-invasive tracking to sophisticated, compliant intelligence that delivers superior results while respecting user privacy.
The post-cookie web is here. The question isn't whether to adapt – it's whether you'll lead the transition or follow behind. Webmetic provides the technology to lead.
**Transform anonymous traffic into qualified opportunities. Personalize without privacy violations. Convert visitors who would otherwise disappear forever.**
*Ready to see which companies are visiting your website?*
---
**Contact**: www.webmetic.de | cw@webmetic.de
**Founded**: 2025 | **Location**: Munich, Germany
**Clients**: Messe München, Condor, freelance.de, ISPO, IAA Mobility

RentalFinder is your personal assistant in the Dutch rental market, designed to take the stress and time out of finding a new home. Whether you're moving to a new city, starting a new job, or simply ready for a fresh start, RentalFinder helps you stay ahead in a highly competitive housing market.
We automate the rental search process by monitoring all major Dutch housing websites 24/7. The moment a new listing appears that matches your preferences, we notify you instantly via email and mobile; giving you the best chance to respond before anyone else. With smart filters, a clean dashboard, and personalized alerts, you no longer have to waste hours manually searching dozens of platforms. 
How it Works:
Simply sign up, set your search preferences (such as location, price range, and amenities), and let RentalFinder do the rest. You’ll receive instant notifications the moment matching listings go live—so you can act quickly, schedule viewings, and find your new home faster.
Most users apply to multiple apartments at once therefore our built-in Application Tracker Dashboard helps you stay organized by keeping track of all your running applications in one place. From first contact to viewing appointments, you'll never lose sight of your progress.
Whether you’re a student, young professional, or expat, RentalFinder makes finding a rental in the Netherlands easy, fast, and frustration-free.
fields.Tags: PropTech, Housing, Rental Housing, Automated Search

fields.Business Description:
Invoice AI is an intelligent invoice automation platform designed for governments, enterprises, and SMEs across Europe and the GCC. It uses multi-agent AI to extract data from invoices, detect fraud and duplication, streamline approval workflows, and ensure full tax compliance with local regulations such as ZATCA (Saudi Arabia) and FTA (UAE).

The platform supports ERP integration (SAP, Oracle, QuickBooks), mobile approvals, real-time cost insights, and optional ESG emissions tracking. With a multilingual interface (English/Arabic), Invoice AI empowers finance teams to reduce costs, increase transparency, and automate financial control — all from a single smart platform.
fields.Long Business Description:
Invoice AI is a next-generation, AI-powered invoice automation platform that enables organizations across the public and private sectors to streamline financial operations, detect anomalies, and ensure tax and ESG compliance — all through a multilingual, enterprise-ready system.
Built with a modular, multi-agent AI architecture, Invoice AI automates the full lifecycle of invoice management: from data extraction using OCR + NLP, to fraud detection, approval workflows, tax categorization, and real-time spend analysis. The platform integrates seamlessly with major ERP systems like SAP, Oracle, QuickBooks, and Microsoft Dynamics.
Invoice AI is specifically designed to meet the regulatory and operational needs of governments, enterprises, and SMEs in regions such as the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) and Europe. It is fully compliant with ZATCA (Saudi Arabia), FTA (UAE), and EU VAT frameworks, supporting automated generation of localized tax reports and VAT summaries.
The platform also offers an optional ESG module, which maps invoice data to Scope 1–3 emissions categories, helping organizations align their procurement spend with sustainability goals.
Key features include:
	•	Intelligent invoice data extraction (PDF, email, image, etc.)
	•	Fraud & duplicate detection via AI agents
	•	Customizable approval workflows and mobile-first interfaces
	•	Multilingual support
	•	Public procurement compliance engine
	•	API marketplace for third-party integrations
	•	WhatsApp invoice alerts and user notifications (in beta)
Invoice AI serves finance departments, government agencies, and growing businesses that require a secure, scalable, and intelligent solution to automate invoice processing while maintaining audit-readiness and compliance across multiple regions.
Whether you’re a public entity managing thousands of transactions or a private enterprise seeking to reduce costs and increase efficiency, Invoice AI is your financial command center powered by real-time intelligence.
fields.Tags: invoice automation, AI finance platform, govtech compliance, ESG analytics

fields.Business Description:
No-code workflow tool for automating and chaining AI prompts. 

Features a drag-and-drop builder, model flexibility, one-click sharing as apps, and reusable automation templates. 

Popular among writers, analysts, and creators for drastically reducing time of AI tasks.
fields.Long Business Description:
AI Flow Chat is a no-code automation platform that turns repetitive AI conversations into reusable, shareable apps. With its drag-and-drop visual builder, teams can design end-to-end workflows that chain multiple prompt, known as prompt chaining, to break complex work into clear reliable steps.  
Visual AI Flow Builder
– Build multi-step prompt chains without writing code.
– Insert conditional branches, loops, and role-based prompts for advanced logic.  
Programmatic Prompting
– Parameterize prompts with variables pulled from user input, databases, or APIs.
– Dynamically generate or refine prompts at runtime for personalized, context-aware output.  
Model Flexibility
– Mix fast, standard, and premium LLMs in the same flow to balance cost and quality.  
One-Click Deployment
– Publish any prompt chain as a branded, shareable web app—public or private—in seconds.  
Prompt chaining lets marketers, writers, analysts, and creators decompose work into atomic steps (e.g., extract → analyze → generate → summarize)

fields.Business Description: Never read a full PDF again. PDF summarizer scans documents and pulls out only what you need to know.

Summarize PDFs

Any language
Turn any PDF into your preferred language instantly. A Spanish contract becomes English, a German research paper becomes French - whatever you need. Read foreign documents as easily as if they were written in your native language.

fields.Business Description: AI-powered Evidence synthesis for pharmaceutical R&D teams
fields.Long Business Description:
Puraite is a spin-off from Paderborn University that develops AI-powered solutions to transform how systematic literature reviews (SLRs), meta-analyses, and broader evidence synthesis are conducted in the pharmaceutical and life sciences industries. Our mission is to enable faster, more transparent, and more scalable generation of medical evidence to support everything from early R&D to market access and health technology assessments (HTA).
Built by a team of machine learning researchers and supported by over €1.1 million in non-dilutive public funding (EXIST Forschungstransfer & StartupTransfer.NRW), Puraite automates critical components of the evidence pipeline: title and abstract screening, full-text review, and structured data extraction. Unlike black-box models, Puraite’s explainable AI engine offers full traceability and confidence scores, making it suitable for regulatory-grade use cases.
Pharmaceutical companies and CROs use Puraite to drastically reduce the time and cost of generating robust, reproducible evidence for drug development, global value dossiers (GVDs), and real-world evidence (RWE) submissions. Our hybrid human-in-the-loop workflow ensures scientific rigor while freeing up expert resources to focus on high-value tasks.
Puraite is currently preparing its market launch and has initiated pilot collaborations with pharma and academic institutions across Europe and North America. Our long-term vision is to become the evidence infrastructure layer for the pharmaceutical industry to offer living reviews, network meta-analyses, and protocol automation as standard.

fields.Business Description: Chik is the most easy-to-use task manager for freelancers and small teams.
fields.Long Business Description:
Chik – The collaborative task manager for freelancers
Chik is the answer to bloated, overly complicated, and sluggish project management software (looking at you Notion and Monday). It's the only task manager built specifically for freelancers and offers only what you actually need:
Time tracking: Track within Chik, per-task. Clients can see the total time tracked. Only you can see the individual log history.
Client dashboard: Give your clients a dedicated dashboard to submit, view, and edit tasks as well as communicate with the built in context-aware chat.
Team members: Even freelancers occasionally bring someone onboard, so invite them directly to your Chik team.
Live chat: Use our context-aware live chat to keep client communication focused. Bye bye Slack, Email, WhatsApp.
How is Chik different?
Chik was born from genuine freelancer frustration.
After years of running my own web studio, I (Jonathan, the founder) found myself constantly battling with task management tools that seemed designed for everyone except me.
Notion demanded endless customization before I could even begin working. Asana and Monday buried essential functions under complex workflows meant for large teams.
Every morning, I'd waste precious billable time clicking through bloated interfaces just to figure out what needed my attention.
That's why I created Chik—a task manager that respects a freelancer's time and workflow. Unlike the corporate-focused alternatives, Chik strips away unnecessary features and focuses exclusively on what independent professionals actually need: clear task visibility, straightforward client collaboration, and contextual communication—all in one uncluttered interface.
Chik isn't trying to be everything for everyone; it's specifically crafted for freelancers who need simplicity and efficiency, by someone who lived their challenges firsthand.
Pricing That Makes Sense
Chik is free for freelancers working with their first couple of clients or small team. As your business grows, our affordable pricing scales with you: just €11/month for unlimited client connections and team members. No complex tiers or hidden fees, just straightforward value for independent professionals.
fields.Tags: Freelancer Task Manager, Time Tracking, Client Dashboard, Project Collaboration, Live Chat, Team Management, Simple Workflow, Chik App, Notion Alternative, Freelance Productivity

This privacy-first solution goes beyond vanity metrics, giving you a clear view of true ROI by revealing which channels, ads, or content result in real customers and revenue (not just clicks). By eliminating guesswork, businesses can confidently invest in what works and cut spend on what doesn’t, without needing a data science team or complex setup.
Key features include automated AI analytics that continuously analyze your performance data and deliver straightforward, data-backed recommendations for improvement. In other words, TheBizness.ai acts like a virtual analyst – flagging opportunities such as conversion gaps or emerging traffic sources and providing conversion optimization suggestions (e.g. improve mobile checkout speed or leverage underutilized channels) to boost results. The platform’s intuitive dashboards offer UTM revenue tracking, tying every visitor and purchase back to its source so you can measure the true ROI of each campaign. You’ll also gain rich customer insights through a dedicated customer overview, highlighting metrics like total customers, average order value, and repeat purchase rate, along with individual purchase histories. Furthermore, TheBizness.ai can analyze specific channels and integrations – from Stripe transactions to YouTube referral traffic – to uncover trends in conversion performance. With these actionable insights and recommendations at hand, marketers and SaaS founders can optimize their strategy, doubling down on high-performing channels and improving underperformers, all through an AI-driven platform that makes advanced marketing analytics accessible to anyone.

fields.Long Business Description: PALPRINT supports businesses in the industrial logistics sector to navigate the challenges of packaging process disruptions, skilled labor shortages, high costs of manual processes, and stringent regulatory compliance requirements. PALPRINT's value proposition to its customers is the automated production of tailor-made, sustainable reusable packaging solutions that ensure optimal product protection in industrial logistics while saving costs, labor, and resources and ensuring compliance with legal standards.

fields.Long Business Description:
BitRewriter is a powerful and user-friendly tool designed to simplify working with JSON data.
It lets you inspect the structure of JSON data without endless scrolling through lines of text. 
It supports converting heavily nested JSON data into consistent tabular data that that can be exported into a variety of formats that is an intuitive representation of the original.
Unlike our competitors, our approach preserves your data in a tabular format with a fixed number of columns. The alternative approaches taken by other tools is to use confusing column naming conventions incorporating property names with numeric indexes that leads to variable number of columns, or rely only on nested structures within cells.
It an invaluable asset for business owners, developers and data analysts who need to work with complex datasets. BitRewriter saves time and reduces the risk of errors, ensuring that data is accurately and efficiently processed.
With BitRewriter, users will soon be able to easily create transformations rules to automate data transformation, making it an efficient solution for automating complex JSON data processing. This feature will allow for seamless integration with various services and APIs.
Whether you are looking to streamline your data workflows, integrate with external services, or simply gain better insights into your JSON data, BitRewriter offers a comprehensive solution.
Its intuitive interface and robust features make it a go-to tool for anyone working with JSON data, providing a seamless and efficient experience from start to finish.

fields.Business Description: Transform your photos into stunning cartoons. Simply add your photos, choose a viral style, and let AI do the magic.
fields.Long Business Description:
AI-powered web app that transforms your photos into captivating cartoon-style images.
 
Use it for creating a unique social media avatar, fun selfies, a personalized cartoon gift, or simply explore a fun artistic rendition of yourself.
 
Key features:
- AI cartoonization: Upload your photos, select from a variety of artistic styles, and let AI generate stunning cartoon versions of your images within minutes
- Diverse artistic styles: Choose from multiple unique styles such as "Miya," "Dee," "Luna," and "Coco," each offering a distinct aesthetic to match your personal taste
- User-friendly interface: The intuitive design makes it accessible for users of all skill levels
AI Ease
- High-resolution outputs: Download your cartoonized images in high resolution, suitable for printing, sharing on social media, or using as profile pictures
- Privacy assurance: Users' privacy is prioritized, ensuring that uploaded photos are processed securely and not stored after conversion
 
Use cases:
- Selfies: Transform your everyday selfies into vibrant, personalized cartoon portraits perfect for profiles and posts
- Group selfies: Turn your group shots into fun, cartoon memories that you and your friends can cherish and share
- Travel photos: Give your favorite travel memories a magical cartoon makeover, ideal for scrapbooks, postcards, or digital albums.
- Social media avatars: Stand out with a creative, cartoon-styled profile picture across your platforms
- Personalized gifts: Create unforgettable, unique gifts for birthdays, anniversaries, and special occasions
- Creative projects: Add a playful artistic touch to blogs, presentations, or marketing materials
 
Why Choose Supertoons?
- Fast and effortless: Get professional-looking cartoon images without any technical skills
- Wide style selection: Multiple unique cartoon styles to match different personalities and occasions
- No app needed: 100% web-based – no downloads, no installations, no hassle
- One-time payment: Pay per image without subscription commitments
fields.Tags: AI Art Tools, Photo Editing, Cartoon Generators

fields.Business Description: The leading marketplace to buy and sell no-code apps. Secure transactions, direct messaging, and early access to new listings.
fields.Long Business Description: Nocode Market is the first dedicated marketplace to buy and sell fully built applications made with no-code tools like Bubble, Adalo, Glide, and more. Whether you're a maker looking to sell your app or a buyer searching for ready-to-launch products, the platform makes transactions smooth, transparent, and tailored to the no-code ecosystem. Each listing is reviewed manually and categorized by stack.

fields.Business Description: Lead Booster Pro is a German-engineered platform that helps B2B companies convert more website visitors into qualified leads without increasing traffic costs. Our intelligent, conversion-optimized forms deliver higher completion rates with built-in lead value tracking for measurable marketing ROI.
fields.Long Business Description:
Lead Booster Pro is a German-engineered lead generation platform that transforms how B2B companies capture and qualify leads from their website traffic. Founded to address the critical gap between basic form builders and complex marketing automation, our solution focuses exclusively on maximizing both conversion rates and lead quality.
Unlike standard form tools, Lead Booster Pro features multi-path qualification flows that adapt to visitor intent, conversion-optimized templates proven to increase completion rates by 30%, and built-in lead value intelligence for tracking marketing ROI. The platform seamlessly integrates with major CRMs like HubSpot and Pipedrive while maintaining GDPR compliance with secure EU hosting.
Our customers - primarily mid-market B2B companies with complex sales processes - use Lead Booster Pro to generate more qualified leads from their existing website traffic without increasing marketing spend. By implementing our intelligent forms for demo requests, contact submissions, and content downloads, they create a more effective qualification journey that converts passive visitors into sales-ready opportunities.
With pricing starting at €60/month and a focus on delivering measurable business results, Lead Booster Pro bridges the gap between basic form builders and enterprise marketing platforms. We're committed to helping European B2B companies scale their lead generation efforts through intelligent form technology designed specifically for complex B2B sales processes.
fields.Tags: lead capture form, form builder, lead generation, conversion optimization
